articles.description: Singer, dancer and former Home And Away actor Johnny Ruffo has returned to the set of Dancing With The Stars to detail his fight against cancer.
articles.content: Former Home And Away star Johnny Ruffo has updated fans on his fight with cancer during a guest appearance on Dancing With The Stars.Singer, dancer and former Home And Away actor Johnny Ruffo has ret… [+2666 chars]
